title: Barcelona Stool  Italian Leather/Black
body: Style Mies Van Der Rohe Barcelona Stool chair originally designed in 1929, manufactured from heighest quality, polished stainless steel available in a number of quality leather uphostery options, elegant and a singles piece, dominant and commanding as a pair. Known globally as the most popular Mid Century designer classic stool to pair with the Barcelona Lounge chair by MVDR.
